reviewText: This is a good all-in-one package that covers several different subjects that are useful, or even essential, for beginning whitewater kayakers. Don't even consider the outrageous asking price for a new copy. Buy used here, or search google for reasonably priced new copies.
I've been whitewater kayaking on and off for around fifteen years. I found this DVD a great collection of content that would be great for newbies or those wanting to keep their skills up.

This has to be one of the best kayaking DVDs I have seen.  Excellent tips and tricks, excellent demonstration video, and good humor.  I wouldn't hesitate to tell people to buy this one that are interested in improving their skills.
